SqlQueries.OTpVarification: SELECT UserId FROM SendSmsOtpDB.dbo.EmailOtpDetail WHERE EmailID=@EmailID AND Otp=@Otp
SqlQueries.GetEmailOtpDetail: SELECT UserId, EmailID, OtpCount, InsertionDate, UpdateDate, (select COUNT(*) from [SendSmsOtpDB].[dbo].[EmailOtpDetail]) as TotalRecord FROM [SendSmsOtpDB].[dbo].[EmailOtpDetail] ORDER BY UpdateDate DESC , InsertionDate DESC OFFSET @Limit ROWS FETCH NEXT @RecordPerPage ROWS ONLY;
